snippet: Senator Rand Paul spoke Tuesday at the Citadel in Charleston, S.C., sharing his opinions on military intervention, the Pentagon and cutting waste in the armed forces.
abstract: Senator Rand Paul speaks at Citadel military college in Charleston, SC, sharing his opinions on military intervention, Pentagon and cutting wasteful spending within armed forces.
lead_paragraph: Senator Rand Paul spoke Tuesday at the Citadel in Charleston, S.C., sharing his opinions on military intervention, the Pentagon and cutting waste in the armed forces.

headline.main: A Senator Lays Out His Positions on the Military, Very Carefully
